sourcesContent:
// Sample course data with placeholder content
const courses = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: 'Introduction to Web Development',
    description: 'Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This course is designed for beginners with no prior experience.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/0/600/400',
    duration: '6 weeks',
    lessons: 12,
    instructor: 'John Smith'
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: 'Advanced React Techniques',
    description: 'Master advanced React concepts including hooks, context API, and performance optimization strategies for building scalable applications.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/1/600/400',
    duration: '8 weeks',
    lessons: 16,
    instructor: 'Emily Johnson'
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: 'Node.js Backend Development',
    description: 'Build robust and scalable backend systems using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learn RESTful API design and authentication.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/2/600/400',
    duration: '10 weeks',
    lessons: 20,
    instructor: 'Michael Chen'
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: 'Data Structures and Algorithms',
    description: 'Comprehensive course covering essential data structures and algorithms. Improve your problem-solving skills and prepare for technical interviews.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/3/600/400',
    duration: '12 weeks',
    lessons: 24,
    instructor: 'Sarah Wilson'
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: 'Mobile App Development with React Native',
    description: 'Create cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. Build real-world projects with industry best practices.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/4/600/400',
    duration: '8 weeks',
    lessons: 16,
    instructor: 'David Thompson'
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: 'Cloud Computing with AWS',
    description: 'Learn to design, deploy, and manage applications on Amazon Web Services. Master essential cloud services and architecture patterns.',
    image: 'https://picsum.photos/id/5/600/400',
    duration: '9 weeks',
    lessons: 18,
    instructor: 'Jessica Martinez'
  }
];

export default courses;
